Constructor Detail

JeuRDF

JeuRDF(java.lang.String source,
       java.lang.String start,
       java.lang.String uri)
 throws RepositoryException,
        java.io.IOException,
        RDFParseException
Simple constructor.

Parameters:
source - : Source file / folder.
start - : Filter on the filenames to import.
uri - : Base URI for the data.
Throws:
RepositoryException - The initialization has failed and no recovery is possible.
java.io.IOException - File/folder error.
RDFParseException - File(s) content isn't correct RDFXML.
Method Detail

addSource

private void addSource(java.lang.String source,
                       java.lang.String start)
                throws RepositoryException,
                       RDFParseException,
                       java.io.IOException
Adds given file(s) to the repository.

Parameters:
source - : Path to the given folder/file.
start - : String to filter filenames with.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If the submitted filepath isn't usable.
RDFParseException - If the RDF data inside the file(s) isn't well-formed.
RepositoryException - Internal repository error.
